topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include a cooling trend as storms approach, a thwarted plot to disrupt cell service, and a rise in violent crime incidents, including a rape in the Bronx and a teen charged with murder. Additionally, Starbucks plans to close 34 locations amid ongoing layoffs.

emergencies_risks.title: Emergencies & Risks
emergencies_risks.summary_md:

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.summary_md:
### Transportation

Transportation changes are underway in NYC, impacting subway lines and bus routes.

- MTA will swap F and M lines between Queens and Manhattan, affecting daily commutes.
